channel.title: QFT II on Modulhandbuch Physik/Astronomie der Universität Bonn
channel.description: Recent content in QFT II on Modulhandbuch Physik/Astronomie der Universität Bonn

item.title: QFT II
item.description: Quantum Field Theory II (T) - QFT II Course Quantum Field Theory II (T) Course No. QFT II Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 4+2 8 ST Requirements: Preparation: Quantum Field Theory I Form of Testing and Examination: Written or oral examination Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: Quantum field theory is one of the main tools of modern physics with many applications ranging from high-energy physics to solid state physics.
